name: neo
0:
”Alexa, turn on TV”
”Alexa, change channel to 101 on TV”
”Alexa, pause TV”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Connect directly into your neo matrix system and issue voice commands instead of using the TV remote. Ask Alexa to turn on or off your TV, play, pause or even change channel


An Alexa enabled neo system allows you to do more than just turn the TV on and off. It allows you to talk to your entire TV system. Use the full range of Amazon SmartHome commands to control your neo matrix.

Some example requests:
"Alexa, turn on the TV"
"Alexa, change the channel to 101"
"Alexa, pause TV"

Talk to your integrator to enable your neo Matrix for Alexa control. For further help email support@pulse-eight.com
